CORRESPONDING_EMAIL_MESSAGE: If your email coresspond to an actual account, you will receive an email with instruction to reset your password
ACCOUNT_CREATED: Your account has been created, check your email to verify it, otherwise, you will not be able to connect
PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: Password must be at least 8 characters long, include uppercase, lowercase, a number, and a special character.
ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL: Invalid e-mail, please provide a valid email
ERROR_INVALID_PASSWORD: Invalid password, it must be at least 8 characters long, include uppercase, lowercase, a number, and a special character.
ERROR_EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: This e-mail is already taken, if it's your account you can try to
ERROR_GENERAL: An error has occurred, please retry or contact an administrator.
NAME_CANT_UNDER_4: Name lenght must be more than 4 characters
NAME_CANT_UPPER_100: Name lenght must be less than 100 characters
DESC_CANT_UNDER_4: Description lenght must be more than 4 characters
DESC_CANT_UPPER_100: Description lenght must be less than 100 characters
USER_ALREADY_READER: This user is already a reader
USER_ALREADY_WRITER: This user is already a writer
